channel.title: Changing max hits or what ever
channel.description: How do you change max hits cus i have fr33sc4p3 and i want it so i dont hit that high, i want it so instead of hitting 90+ or what ever i want to lower it down. The only way i can think of is changing the bonus's on items but that would tae forever. So anyone know? Please post, and thankyou :D. I'll brb i g2g take a shower lol.. I'll check up on in a bit.
